item.title: Lúnasa
item.description: Lúnasa (which means “the month of august”) is an ancient Celtic festival and celebration that takes place on August 1st in the northern hemisphere. Lúnasa marks the beginning of the harvest season. This festival is associated with the old god Lugh. Associations Symbols: Colors: Herbs and plants: Trees: Links and references
